content.text:
# King Krule (EP)

King Krule is the first EP by King Krule, released on 8 November 2011.
Reception
| rev3 = Pitchfork
| rev3Score = 8.0/10
| rev1 = The A.V. Club
| rev1Score = B
| rev2 = Beats Per Minute
| rev2Score = 71%
| rev4 = Rolling Stone
| rev4Score =
}}
On Metacritic, the EP has received an average review score of 73/100, indicating "generally favorable" reviews.
